org.apache.hadoop.hbase

类 HBaseCommonTestingUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseCommonTestingUtility
  • 直接已知子类:
    HBaseZKTestingUtility

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public class HBaseCommonTestingUtility
extends Object
    Common helpers for testing HBase that do not depend on specific server/etc. things. HBaseTestingUtility

      • getConfiguration

        public org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration getConfiguration()

        返回:

      • getDataTestDir

        public org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getDataTestDir()
        返回:
        Where to write test data on local filesystem, specific to the test. Useful for tests that do not use a cluster. Creates it if it does not exist already.

      • getDataTestDir

        public org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getDataTestDir(String subdirName)
        参数:
        subdirName -
        返回:
        Path to a subdirectory named subdirName under getDataTestDir(). Does *NOT* create it if it does not exist.

      • setupDataTestDir

        protected org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path setupDataTestDir()
        Sets up a directory for a test to use.
        返回:
        New directory path, if created.

      • getRandomDir

        public org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getRandomDir()
        返回:
        A dir with a random (uuid) name under the test dir
        另请参阅:
        getBaseTestDir()
